title: The Hidden Cost of AI in Early Careers
content: Exploring how AI adoption is reshaping entry-level positions and what it means for career development in the age of automation.

title: Collaborative Coding in the Age of LLMs
content: Exploring how AI is transforming the software development lifecycle. From code generation to automated testing, LLMs are reshaping how we build software. Deep dive into practical applications and future implications.

title: History of the Price of Cryptocurrency Visualization
content: The project discusses about cryptocurrency prices and what might affect them. The visualizations show comparisons between prices of cryptocurrencies, networks used by the cryptocurrencies, history of Bitcoin, and cryptocurrencies as a method of investment.

title: Predicting Covid-19 Effect on San Francisco City Job Market
content: Published data driven analysis on Medium predicting SF's job market after the initial phase of Covid-19.
